mapper.select:
select id,title,resId,fromFlag,unifytype,size,timeline,time,imgpath,filesuffix from ( select distinct 0 as id ,a.id as resId,a.name as title,a.createTime as time,1 as fromFlag,p.id as unifyTypeId ,p.MType as unifyType,a.AssetSize as size,'' as timeline,a.AssetPath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(AssetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(AssetPath))-1)) as fileSuffix,0 as orderIdx from j_prepare_content t LEFT JOIN z_asset a on a.id = t.contId LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifyTypeId LEFT JOIN j_lession_prepare pre on (pre.id = t.preId and pre.userid = #{userId} ) where t.flag = false and t.contType in (1,9) and a.flag =false and a.FileType = 'A' and pre.flag = false
UNION ALL select distinct 0 as id,z.Id as resId,z.title,z.CreateDT as time,0 as fromFlag,p.id as unifyTypeId ,p.MType as unifyType,z.FSize as size,IFNULL(m.res_time,'') as timeline,CONCAT(z.FPath,'/',z.Fname) as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(fname))-1)) as fileSuffix,0 as orderIdx from j_prepare_content t LEFT JOIN z_resource z on t.contId = z.Id LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = z.MType LEFT JOIN z_res_medium m on m.res_code = z.ResCode LEFT JOIN j_lession_prepare pre on (pre.id = t.preId and pre.userid = #{userId} ) where t.flag = false and t.contType in (2,10) and z.flag = false and pre.flag = false UNION ALL select distinct 0 as id,r.id as resId,r.title,r.CreateDT as time ,fromFlag as fromFlag,p.id as unifyTypeId ,p.MType as unifyType,r.FSize as size,'' as timeline,r.fullpath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(fname))-1)) as fileSuffix,0 as orderIdx from j_prepare_content t LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource r on r.id = t.contId LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = r.MType LEFT JOIN j_lession_prepare pre on (pre.id = t.preId and pre.userid = #{userId} ) where t.flag = false and t.contType in (11,12) and r.flag = false and pre.flag = false
)temp_result where 1 =1
and EXISTS ( select id from x_resourcetype where (id = #{unifyTypeId} or pid = #{unifyTypeId} )and flag =false and id = temp_result.unifyTypeId )
and EXISTS (select FormatCode from j_filetypedetail where flag = false and FileFormat =#{fileFormat} and FormatCode = CONCAT('.',temp_result.filesuffix))
ORDER BY time desc
